title: Beacon's Call 2
author: Adventurer H. C.
pages: As I wander through caverns deep, I uncover glorious veins of iron. Fortune smiles on the determined!
Smelting these ores into hefty blocks is next. The process is like a blacksmith's dance with flame and metal.
I must stay vigilant, as unfriendly creatures lurk. Armor and sword are my steadfast companions against their menace.
After days of toil, sufficient blocks are now mine. Time to erect the beacon's pedestal from the depths of the earth.
